string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC001
string_tip.body: Tip: You do not lose XP when you are killed by a player in the Arena or PvP.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC002
string_tip.body: Tip: You do not lose Abyss Points when you are killed by a player in the Arena or PvP.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC003
string_tip.body: Tip: Learn new skills by purchasing a Skill Book from the Class Instructor or Trainer.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC004
string_tip.body: Tip: Access Help by pressing the <H> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC005
string_tip.body: Tip: After Level 6, you lose XP when you die.\nSome lost XP can be restored by Soul Healers next to Obelisks.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC006
string_tip.body: Tip: To change where you resurrect when you die, bind to an Obelisk.\nTo find nearby Obelisks type "/where obelisk".

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC007
string_tip.body: Tip: The Abyss is available to characters Level 25 or higher.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC008
string_tip.body: Tip: To link information on an item, quest, or skill in Chat, press the Ctrl key then Right-Click the item.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC009
string_tip.body: Tip: To link quest information in Chat, press the Ctrl key then Right-Click the Quests Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC010
string_tip.body: Tip: To link item information in Chat, press the Ctrl key then Right-Click the Item in the Crafting Window

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC011
string_tip.body: Tip: To view a character's class, level, or other information, Click the name of the character in Chat.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC012
string_tip.body: Tip: To preview weapons and armor on your character, press the Ctrl key then Click the item.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC013
string_tip.body: Tip: To change the camera angle press the Shift key then Right-Click and drag.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC014
string_tip.body: Tip: Toggle Auto-Run by pressing <NumLock> or Clicking both mouse buttons at the same time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC015
string_tip.body: Tip: To reduce loading times adjust graphic settings <Start Menu-Preferences-Graphics Settings>.\n They can also be auto adjusted by turning on <Auto>

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC016
string_tip.body: Tip: Cities and many towns have Mailboxes where you can send and receive mail.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC017
string_tip.body: Tip: It's not the fall that gets you, it's the impact! Falling from a great height will inflict potentially fatal fall damage.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC018
string_tip.body: Tip: You can Ascend as a Daeva and choose a sub-class when you reach Level 10.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC019
string_tip.body: Tip: The green gauge around the Fly button (wings icon) displays your remaining flying time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC020
string_tip.body: Tip: Daevas can glide by pressing the <Space Bar> in the middle of a jump.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC021
string_tip.body: Tip: Zones that are extremely populated may have more than one Zone Channel. Group members need to be on the same Channel.\nChange your Channel number in <Start Menu-Support-Change Channel>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC022
string_tip.body: Tip: The Fly button (wings icon) toggles flight on and off.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC023
string_tip.body: Tip: Aggressive monsters and characters of opposing races are displayed as red dots on the Compass.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC024
string_tip.body: Tip: Whisper back to the last person who sent you a Whisper by pressing the <T> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC025
string_tip.body: Tip: Check the box in the Quest Window to load a quest in the Quest Tracker.\nQuest Tracker allows you to monitor your quest progress from the UI while playing.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC026
string_tip.body: Tip: Click blue words in quests to bring up a definition with more detailed information.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC027
string_tip.body: Tip: The Menu button at the bottom of the screen offers access to many useful windows. Default <F10> key for Menu.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC028
string_tip.body: Tip: Group Leaders can display brands on targets by Right-Clicking the Show Brand Action in the Skills window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC029
string_tip.body: Tip: Press <B> key to activate or deactivate equipped Power Shards.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC030
string_tip.body: Tip: Find NPCs or locations by typing "/where CharacterName" in Chat.\n Typing "/where' in Chat will cancel.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC031
string_tip.body: Tip: To view both the Map and the Game Screen at the same time, use the transparent overlay. Default <N> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC032
string_tip.body: Tip: To mark locations on your Map and link to them in chat, press Ctrl then Right-Click on the Map.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC033
string_tip.body: Tip: Right-Clicking a location mark you've made on the Map opens a pop-up menu with additional features.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC034
string_tip.body: Tip: Clicking the Abandon button on the Crafting Request in the Mission/Quests Window will abandon the current Crafting Quest.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC035
string_tip.body: Tip: When your Craft skill is maxed out for your Skill Level, talk to a Crafting Master to access the next level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC036
string_tip.body: Tip: To view current Legion or Character rankings, first click the Influence Ratio icon on the bottom right of the screen, then the Abyss Rank button.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC037
string_tip.body: Tip: Legions can only be created or disbanded by visiting the Legions Board in Pandaemonium or Sanctum.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC038
string_tip.body: Tip: Moving during combat can increase your defense or attack.\nOn-screen arrows indicate the current active bonuses.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC039
string_tip.body: Tip: Up to three additional Quickbars, as well as two floating Quickbars, are available in <Preferences-Game Options-UI>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC040
string_tip.body: Tip: Fortresses and cities have warehouses where you can store spare items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC041
string_tip.body: Tip: All characters on an account share one account warehouse.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC042
string_tip.body: Tip: Expand your Cube (inventory) space by visiting a Cube Artisan.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED001
string_tip.body: Tip: Rifts are corridors to enemy territory. There is a limit on the number of characters who can travel through a Rift.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED002
string_tip.body: Tip: Toggle the Altitude Lock while Flying by pressing <Scroll Lock>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED003
string_tip.body: Tip: To copy character, item, or location information from Chat to your Memo Pad, Right-Click the information.\nNavigate to your Memo Pad through Menu/Community.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED004
string_tip.body: Tip: Capturing a fortress in the Abyss temporarily boosts the abilities of all members of the conquering race.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED005
string_tip.body: Tip: Significant differences in influence ratio will give a PvP boost to the disadvantaged race.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED006
string_tip.body: Tip: Fortresses and cities have Abyss Distributors where you can spend Abyss Points on armor and weapons.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED007
string_tip.body: Tip: You can consume food and beverages at the same time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED008
string_tip.body: Tip: At Level 20, you can start quests that qualify you to equip Stigma Stones.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED009
string_tip.body: Tip: In increasing order of rarity and value, Normal items are White, Rare are Green, Heroic are Blue, and Fabled are Yellow.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED010
string_tip.body: Tip: Once you reach Level 20 or higher, you can change your item appearance via the Item Remodeller in a city.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED011
string_tip.body: Tip: Enchanting your weapon with Godstones is a snap. Just Double-Click and apply it to your weapon of choice.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED012
string_tip.body: Tip: Quest types include 'Missions', 'Quests', and 'Crafting Quests'.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED013
string_tip.body: Tip: When a quest marker appears as a double arrow, the NPC has a reward waiting for you.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED014
string_tip.body: Tip: To toggle the camera view to face your character, click the <Scroll Wheel>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED015
string_tip.body: Tip: Default <Shift-Z> to switch between weapons.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED016
string_tip.body: Tip: You don't have to go to a mailbox to read Express Mail.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED017
string_tip.body: Tip: When you receive Express Mail, just click the Express Mail Icon next to your Compass.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED018
string_tip.body: Tip: You can check your Chain Skills in the Skills Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED019
string_tip.body: Tip: Cycle through nearby targets by pressing <Tab>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED020
string_tip.body: Tip: The number of dots on the left of the Target Window indicates the difficulty of the monster.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED021
string_tip.body: Tip: Some hard-to-find NPCs wander around or only appear at specific times, rather than remaining in one spot.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED022
string_tip.body: Tip: View the current status of the Abyss War by selecting the Abyss on the Map.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED023
string_tip.body: Tip: When a Legion reaches Level 3, they can design and register their own Legion Emblem.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED024
string_tip.body: Tip: DP does not reset until the character has been logged off for 5 minutes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED025
string_tip.body: Tip: Well-timed attacks can interrupt an enemy's Skill or Spell.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED026
string_tip.body: Tip: Altered States may cause you to become temporarily immobilized or unable to fight.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED027
string_tip.body: Tip: Altered States such as Bleed, Poison, or Burn will cause you to suffer periodic damage.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED028
string_tip.body: Tip: You do not lose XP when you are killed in the Arena.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED029
string_tip.body: Tip: Spiritmasters can issue commands to Spirits by using the Command buttons next to the Quickbar.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED030
string_tip.body: Tip: When you use an item to transform into a Worg or Karnif, you will cannot use skills.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED031
string_tip.body: Tip: Dredgions take interest in the race with a higher Influence Ratio.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED032
string_tip.body: Tip: Artifacts play an important strategic role in a Fortress Siege.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED033
string_tip.body: Tip: You can earn Abyss Points in Fortress Battles, or by hunting monsters in the Abyss.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED034
string_tip.body: Tip: Special skills may be available depending on your Abyss Rank.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED035
string_tip.body: Tip: Teleporting is more expensive in the Abyss when a Fortress Battle is in progress there.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED036
string_tip.body: Tip: You can use a Gate Repair Stone to Repair a Gate

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED037
string_tip.body: Tip: The Aetheric Field of a fortress is lost when the Aetheric Field Generator is destroyed.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED038
string_tip.body: Tip: Using higher level Enchantment Stones, increases the success rate of Enchantments.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED039
string_tip.body: Tip: If you have armor or weapons you no longer want, you can create Enchantment Stones by using Extraction tools.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED040
string_tip.body: Tip: You can extract higher level Enchantment Stones from higher ranked items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED041
string_tip.body: Tip: A failed Enchantment attempt weakens previous Enchantments on that item by 1 level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED042
string_tip.body: Tip: To use a Godstone to strengthen an item, you need to visit a Godstone Socketer.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED043
string_tip.body: Tip: Soul Bound items cannot be sold or traded to other characters, but can be sold to Merchants.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED044
string_tip.body: Tip: To divide multiple items, use Shift then Double-Click the item stack.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED045
string_tip.body: Tip: A Critical Success during crafting will result in a higher tier item, which will have better bonuses.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED046
string_tip.body: Tip: Increase your crafting skills faster by completing Work Orders.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED047
string_tip.body: Tip: Players can type "/dice" or "/roll" to make random decisions.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED048
string_tip.body: Tip: Group Leaders can choose to divide loot by having members roll dice or bid on items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED049
string_tip.body: Tip: Sell all junk items at once by clicking <Sell all Misc> in the merchant's Sell Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED050
string_tip.body: Tip: Trade Brokers allow you to buy or sell items on consignment.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED051
string_tip.body: Tip: Once your Legion is Level 2 or higher, you can use the Legion Item Merchant.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED052
string_tip.body: Tip: You can attach items or Kinah to mail that you send.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED053
string_tip.body: Tip: When mail arrives, a letter icon will appear next to the Compass. To read regular mail, go to a mailbox.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED054
string_tip.body: Tip: Use the Auto Arrange Inventory button at the bottom of your Cube to sort items by type.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED055
string_tip.body: Tip: A Daeva that finds themselves in water may be prevented from taking flight. Deep water is dangerous and can injure or kill characters.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED056
string_tip.body: Tip: Some food, items, and potions increase the duration of your flying time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED057
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot use items while gliding.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED058
string_tip.body: Tip: Once you become a Daeva, you can use a teleporter to travel to other regions and cities.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED059
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot use items while on an Airship or Hoverstone.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED060
string_tip.body: Tip: Emotes can liven up your communication with other players.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED061
string_tip.body: Tip: Make your skills, actions, and items more accessible by dragging them to the Quickbars.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED062
string_tip.body: Tip: You can lock the Quickbar slots by clicking the Padlock icon to the left of the Quickbar.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED063
string_tip.body: Tip: The UI can be toggled off for clean screenshots by pressing <F12>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED064
string_tip.body: Tip: To hide all other players on the screen, toggle with <Shift-F12>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED065
string_tip.body: Tip: When your icon on the Compass is magenta, you are at an altitude that risks fatal fall damage.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED066
string_tip.body: Tip: The <Enter> key opens the Chat Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED067
string_tip.body: Tip: Click and drag the Chat Window tabs to rearrange them, or to put them anywhere on the screen.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED068
string_tip.body: Tip: To send another Whisper to the same person, press <Tab> while in the Chat Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED069
string_tip.body: Tip: Video Tutorials are available in <1:1 Inquiries-Beginner Help>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED070
string_tip.body: Tip: You can see how your Class Skills chain together in the Chain tab of the Skills Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED071
string_tip.body: Tip: For easier communication, add friends to your Friends list. Default <V> key for Social.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED072
string_tip.body: Tip: Display the distance to your target in <Preferences-Game Options-Combat Info>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED073
string_tip.body: Tip: Set the UI to top or bottom in <Preferences-Game Options-UI>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED074
string_tip.body: Tip: Macros allow more convenient access to sequences of actions you perform frequently.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED075
string_tip.body: Tip: To Auto-Follow a targeted group member, Double-Click the Group Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED076
string_tip.body: Tip: Important hints for quests may appear in NPC dialogs and cutscenes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED077
string_tip.body: Tip: Complete Coin Quests to earn more Coins, which can be exchanged for valuable or rare rewards.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED078
string_tip.body: Tip: Certain monsters drop items that begin quests.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED079
string_tip.body: Tip: When a monster shouts during combat, its companions may join the fight.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED080
string_tip.body: Tip: Monsters with unique names are more powerful, and drop more valuable items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED081
string_tip.body: Tip: NPCs in enemy bases have more powerful stats and skills than normal monsters.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED082
string_tip.body: Tip: Treasure Chests don't always yield valuable items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED083
string_tip.body: Tip: Some Skills cannot be used while flying.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED084
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot request a duel with a player who is in combat or trading.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED085
string_tip.body: Tip: In the Arena, all players outside your group count as enemies.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED086
string_tip.body: Tip: Prices and taxes fluctuate with your race's Influence Ratio.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED087
string_tip.body: Tip: Check remaining time, bindings, and resurrections at a Kisk.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED088
string_tip.body: Tip: Many towns have a Manastone Remover who can remove Manastones from an item so others can be added.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED089
string_tip.body: Tip: To restore an item's original color, buy Dye Remover from a city merchant.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED090
string_tip.body: Tip: Vortices floating in the sky provide Aether for crafting.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED091
string_tip.body: Tip: You increase your Legion's level by earning Abyss Points.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED092
string_tip.body: Tip: You can create a private chat channel for you and your friends.\nType "/channelhelp" to learn more.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED093
string_tip.body: Tip: Open a private store to sell things to other players. Default <Y> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED094
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot progress some quests unless you are wearing a specific title.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED095
string_tip.body: Tip: The icon next to the Compass tells you the current time of day/night.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED096
string_tip.body: Tip: To know when you can capture a fortress or artifact, hover your cursor over its icon on the Abyss Map.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED097
string_tip.body: Tip: You can reduce the size of the UI and windows in <Preferences-Game Options-UI>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED098
string_tip.body: Tip: Some Merchant NPCs may only appear at certain times of day or events.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED099
string_tip.body: Tip: Test your skills against other players by dueling.\nTo Request Duel, Right-click the player or type "/duel".

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED100
string_tip.body: Tip: You can enable your target's target view in <Preferences-Game Options-Combat Info>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED101
string_tip.body: Tip: To send a Whisper to someone, type "/w CharacterName" then the message in Chat.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC043
string_tip.body: Tip: Press <H> key to open Help, where you can view Beginner Help and Chat Commands info.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC044
string_tip.body: Tip: Limited Sale Merchant NPCs that are [Sold Out] cannot sell particular items until their goods are restocked.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC045
string_tip.body: Tip: Items with a one-per-day limit can't be purchased if their daily limit has been reached, even if the Merchant NPC has not [Sold Out]. Items will be available for purchase again at a specified time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC046
string_tip.body: Tip: Items marked as "Bundled Material Items" can be split into 3 lower grade material items of the same type.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC047
string_tip.body: Tip: Fusing 2 two-handed weapons enhances its stats and increases its number of Manastone slots. You can combine weapons by visiting the Armsfusion Officers in large cities.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC048
string_tip.body: Tip: You can obtain a daily quest when you join a special organization. The daily quest is reset at 9:00 AM.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC049
string_tip.body: Tip: You can receive various rewards by completing daily quests.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC050
string_tip.body: Tip: Mist Merchants lend items for a set period of time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC051
string_tip.body: Tip: A Mist item cannot be enchanted, Manastone Socketed, or sold. It disappears automatically when its time limit expires.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC052
string_tip.body: Tip: Using a supplement increases the success rate of enchanting or Manastone socketing. Supplements can be purchased from Potion Suppliers in every village.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC053
string_tip.body: Tip: When enchanting, you must use a supplement that is appropriate for the level of the weapon.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC054
string_tip.body: Tip: When you reach Level 50, you are allowed to travel to Balaurea. Use the Aerolink in each city.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC055
string_tip.body: Tip: Balaurea has Windstreams, which enable you to travel to your destination faster. You can catch a Windstream by gliding into it.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC056
string_tip.body: Tip: You can find a group more easily by pressing the <Shift+V> keys or <Start Menu-Find Group> to open the Find Group window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC057
string_tip.body: Tip: Using the info boards in a city allows you to locate an NPC easily.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC058
string_tip.body: Tip: You can find out the wait time remaining for instanced zones by using <Start Menu-Instance Info> or the "/CheckEntry" command.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC059
string_tip.body: Tip: You can still check your mail at the Mailbox even when the Express Courier is not there.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC060
string_tip.body: Tip: You can't receive new mail if your Mailbox is full.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC061
string_tip.body: Tip: When using a Trade Broker NPC, Right-Clicking items will automatically enter the search word on the Trade Broker window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC062
string_tip.body: Tip: When you reach Level 10, you may use a Teleport Statue to go to an Empyrean Lord's Temple.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED102
string_tip.body: Tip: You may only join one organization at a time that gives daily quests. To join another organization, you must leave the current one first.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED103
string_tip.body: Tip: While traveling on a Windstream, attempting to change direction or alter speed may cause you to exit.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED104
string_tip.body: Tip: When you defeat certain foes, ascending air currents or geysers may form nearby. You can ride the geyser to a higher elevation by gliding above it.
